sentences.english: My grandfather is also warm-hearted to his neighbors and is always ready to help them.
sentences.chinese: 姥爺對鄰居也很熱心，他總是樂於助人。

sentences.english: Now my grandfather is living in another city with my aunt.
sentences.chinese: 此刻姥爺和我阿姨一路住在另一個城市。

sentences.english: Grandfather is very arm-hearted to his neighbors and is al ays ready to help them.
sentences.chinese: 姥爺對鄰居們也很熱心，總是樂於助人。

sentences.english: Dashu is the one who misses him the most.
sentences.chinese: 最想姥爺的人就是大樹了。

sentences.english: Do cattle and horses, when you become old, or has been abandoned patriarchal grandfather.
sentences.chinese: 做牛做馬，人老珠黃時，還是被重男輕女的姥爺拋棄。

sentences.english: Lao-ye left Shanghai the day after Huahua was born.
sentences.chinese: 姥爺在花花出生第二天飛回包頭了。

sentences.english: Grandpa is not only knowledgeable, but also very humorous.
sentences.chinese: 姥爺是個不單博學，還很詼諧地人。

sentences.english: My grandpa tony always wears in gray. He read me comic books.
sentences.chinese: 我姥爺託尼總喜歡穿灰色衣服，他常給我讀連環畫書。

sentences.english: No my grandfather is living in another city ith my aunt.
sentences.chinese: 現在姥爺和我阿姨一起住在另一個城市。

sentences.english: CCTV Man  Your grandpa must be good at playing mahjong.
sentences.chinese: 你姥爺打麻將肯定是高手。

sentences.english: He was thrilled, since it was the only hymnal in his church.
sentences.chinese: 姥爺如獲至寶，因爲那是教會里唯一的讚美詩集。

definition: daughter's son/grandson/descendant via the female line
to take care of/to raise money/to attend to (guests, customers etc)
my (you etc) old father/polite appellation for an elderly male
to enumerate sb's shortcomings/to criticize/to scold/to talk on and on
cheerful and optimistic/in a good mood/gaily
